resources.string: You will need to sign in again with your username and password in order to sync data again. Continue?

Data is cached to make the app more responsive, reduce your data usage and avoid hitting query limits on databases. Please only do this if you are experiencing problems with the app. Are you sure you want to delete saved data?
Connect to strava to sync your activities and data to the app!
Do you want to sync new data from strava? Please avoid doing this in order to avoid remote query limits.
Data Filtered! Press "Graph" to view updates
All local data has been erased
Use one finger to pan. Place one finger in the bottom left of the screen and use the other finger to rotate. Pinch with two fingers to zoom
